name: European Food Law Association
goal: EFLA's essential goal is to study and to promote food law, as well as to contribute to its development and to its international harmonisation, whilst taking into account the specificity of food law, its interdisciplinary nature and its special function, the protection of the consumers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: Any food, nutrition and health regulations, including REFIT of the General Food Law Regulation 178/2002.
